en.sc1: Adding at the front of the list is relatively simple. Here we're adding 15.
en.sc2: Create a new Node where its value is 15 and next points to the old head.
en.sc3: On the same line, we update head to point to this new Node.
en.sc4: Next, check if tail is null. If tail is null, that means that the list was previously empty, and so we would update tail to point to the same node as head.
en.sc5: Finally, increase the list size by 1.
